mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.goodsid AS "goods.id", cg.name AS "goods.name", cg.sj AS "goods.sj", cg.big AS "goods.big.id", cuna.name AS "goods.big.name", cg.zong AS "goods.zong.id", cunb.name AS "goods.zong.name", cg.small AS "goods.small.id", cunc.name AS "goods.small.name", cg.specid AS "goods.spec.id", csp.name AS "goods.spec.name", a.houseid AS "house.id", ch.name AS "house.name", a.rknub AS "rknub", a.rkhnub AS "rkhnub", a.rkqcbj AS "rkqcbj", a.rkhcbj AS "rkhcbj", a.supplierid AS "supplier.id", csu.name AS "supplier.name", a.state AS "state", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", su.name AS "createBy.name", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.storeId AS "storeId.id"
